name: VR Flight Simulator Starter
description:
VR Flight Simulator is a game where you can fly above several beautiful landscapes in virtual reality.
In this free version you can fly to the Alps and Mt Blanc (France/Italy).
Seven additional landscapes are available in the full no-ads version.

The following elements are needed to pilot the aircraft in VR:
- Google cardboard compatible headset
- Made for iPhone/iPad bluetooth gamepad controller (current version was tested with the Steelseries/Nimbus gamepad available from App Store).
